uploadImg.uploadText: drag / paste / Click here to select the image

step0.contentLeft: Create one to store the picture

step1.title: Create a repo permissions
step1.content1: And then click Generate token button，generate a token，as following picture shows：
step1.content2: Newly generated Token will be displayed only once, please keep!If lost, can be regenerated。

step2.title: Configure the graph bed (binding GitHub Token, the repository and directory where the images are stored)
step2.content1: 1、Fill in the Token to automatically get the repository under the user
step2.content2: 2、In the drop-down list for the warehouse, select one of the warehouses as the diagram bed
step2.content3: 3、Select or create a new warehouse branch
step2.content4: 4、Select a directory (that is, the folder in the warehouse where the pictures are stored)
step2.li1: New Directory: You Need to enter a new directory manually.
step2.li2: Root: images will be stored directly in the warehouse root.
step2.li3: Automatic Directory: automatically generates a directory for the date format YYYMMDD. Example: 20200909
step2.li4: Select the warehouse directory: automatically get under the warehouse all directories, select one can.

step3.title: Congratulations on completing the diagram bed tutorial

help.paragraph1: PicX is a graphics tool based on GitHub API, which provides image upload hosting and image link generation services.
help.paragraph2: No download required! No installation required! Web-side online use! Free! Steady! Convenient! Zoom!
help.paragraph4: It is recommended to add this site to the browser favorites for your next visit.
help.paragraph8: If you encounter a problem using it, read the document carefully or Issue it to the author
help.paragraph9: Picture uploads slowly or does not load out and so on, can use
help.paragraph10: Serious Statement: Please do not upload through this site in violation of your local laws of the picture, caused by all the consequences and this site has nothing to do.

pleaseSelectRepo: Please select the drawing bed warehouse...
toast3: The root directory of the branch
toast4: Automatically create a directory with the format YYYMMDD based on the date
upli1: Upload to images with hash code (ensure picture only, it is strongly recommended that open)
upli2: Prefix name and configuration to the picture upload (example: ABC - image. JPG, ABC - for prefix)
upli4: After the success of the upload copy image links enabled
lkLi1: Choose a picture link type rules
comli3: (compressed format for webp images, most modern browsers support)
comli4: (compressed image format for JPG, compatibility is best)
comli5: (compressed image format for avif, the highest compression ratio, currently only Google browser support)
themeli5: Set the day mode time interval:
